title: Tales From the House of the Moon
description: Fandom: InuYashaKagome, now in college, discovers the tale of Sesshomaru and Rin. Grief can be a prison, but the bonds of love are not easily broken. What is the truth behind fairytales?PAIRING: Kagome/Sesshomaru328.000 words aprox.
author: Resmiranda
